Simple Bubble Shooter

Free, no ads.

Simple Bubble Shooter is the classic bubble shooter game with a flat and minimal design.

What it is.

Simple Bubble Shooter refers to the classic game of bubble shooter offering predefined scenarios where you can prove your skills and also the possibility to create other levels in a random way throught the setting of some parameters with a value you decide.

What it can do:

  • Puzzle mode with predefined scenarios and best score saving.
  • Arcade mode with random scenarios.
  • It is possible to set the number of rows in the arcade mode.
  • It is possible to set the number of columns in the arcade mode.
  • It is possible to set the number of bubbles shot before the line advances in the arcade mode.

How it looks like.

Learn more and download our application by visiting its official store page.
